name: Tea Falls
description:
-- TeaFalls -- 

Welcome to TeaFalls!
A marvellous world where there are incredible tea cascades with a subtle taste. Collect in the most cup of tea and sugar cube to get the best score! But watch out for the poison!

-- Assets used (also can be found now in README.txt)
